formattedAddress: 9 Pennsylvania Plaza, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 9 Pennsylvania Plaza, New York, NY 10001, USA

editorialSummary.text: High-end steakhouse serving an array of meats & seafood plus wine in a simple dining room.

originalText.text: The food was awesome. We had the prime rib for two, and it was incredible. We had the calamari as an appetizer. It was tender and yummy. The service was great. I gave it a 4 for atmosphere because it was a little cramped and noisy, but that's what you get in most places in the city. They try to squeeze in as many tables as they can.

text.text: The food was awesome. We had the prime rib for two, and it was incredible. We had the calamari as an appetizer. It was tender and yummy. The service was great. I gave it a 4 for atmosphere because it was a little cramped and noisy, but that's what you get in most places in the city. They try to squeeze in as many tables as they can.

originalText.text: My job organized someone's retirement here and it's often a difficult place to make a reservation with generally, as we tried afterwards for other functions with no luck. The fixed price menu was full of general stuff, and most people went with the Burgers and fries, which were good- not amazing. They served our party quickly since it wasn't too busy in the early afternoon. The best thing I ate was the dessert. That cheesecake was moist and creamy.

text.text: My job organized someone's retirement here and it's often a difficult place to make a reservation with generally, as we tried afterwards for other functions with no luck. The fixed price menu was full of general stuff, and most people went with the Burgers and fries, which were good- not amazing. They served our party quickly since it wasn't too busy in the early afternoon. The best thing I ate was the dessert. That cheesecake was moist and creamy.

originalText.text:
Great spot before the Rangers game.
Apps: bread, tuna crudo and calamari all excellent
Entrees: salmon and branzino entrees were  great, only reason I am giving 4 and not 5 overall is the porterhouse ordered medium rare was served rare/blue. Don’t like sending food back but could have used another minute on the grill.

text.text:
Great spot before the Rangers game.
Apps: bread, tuna crudo and calamari all excellent
Entrees: salmon and branzino entrees were  great, only reason I am giving 4 and not 5 overall is the porterhouse ordered medium rare was served rare/blue. Don’t like sending food back but could have used another minute on the grill.

originalText.text: The food itself is really good. However, this was my second time there and now they charge you $9 for bread that used to be complimentary, which is the case in 99% of restaurants. The tables are way too close, another customer knocked over our water glass because she had to squeeze into the seat. And then I heard a bus boy be rude to the woman next to me because she had her jacket on her chair and he told her to move it because he almost dropped his tray. He did not say it in a nice manner.

text.text: The food itself is really good. However, this was my second time there and now they charge you $9 for bread that used to be complimentary, which is the case in 99% of restaurants. The tables are way too close, another customer knocked over our water glass because she had to squeeze into the seat. And then I heard a bus boy be rude to the woman next to me because she had her jacket on her chair and he told her to move it because he almost dropped his tray. He did not say it in a nice manner.

originalText.text: To me it's a restaurant that caters to people going to a show/concert/game at MSG.  Not a traditional NYC steak house.  Wasn't impressed at all with the food. My bone in rib eye was not a 22oz.  Very small and too charred.  Tables are too close to each other.  My romantic dinner with my wife was anything but.  Every table could hear each other's conversations.  The sides are NOT shareable by any means.  A couple will definitely need two.  It was my birthday dinner and my wife asked the waiter if he could bring cake or slice of cheesecake.  He said he could bring her a candle.  We ordered the warm chocolate cake.  It was ICE cold and no flavor.  I wouldn't ever go back.   JUST MY EXPERIENCE.
